introduction: VR"Opal" is an interactive installation showcasing the profound influence of ecosystem connections. Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing artifact, crafted from an assortment of extraordinary materials and vibrant colors, seamlessly merging the realms of minerals, plants, and technology.Engage with the installation via beams of light from physical flashlights, and delve into the very core of the object to unveil a world teeming with rhizomes and particles. As you explore, the elements spring to life, shimmering and responding to your movements and the play of light. Participate in a chain reaction, igniting the interconnected network within.
